title: Hail of Thorns
tags: how to acquire hail of thorns
content:
Hail of Thorns Level 1 Conjuration Spell Weapon Damage +1d10Piercing The thorns deal Weapon Damage to the target and then explode. The explosion deals an additional 1~10 Piercing damage to the target and surrounding creatures. On Miss: Thorns still explode.On Save: Targets still take half damage from the explosion. 18m DEX Save Action Level 1 Spell Slot Bonus Action
